Title: Reveil
Description: Reveil is a desktop alarm clock and pomodoro clock
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Reveil is a desktop alarm clock and pomodoro clock





Reveil is an unofficial application of the Pomodoro Technique®.

References

  • WPF Loading Wait Adorner, Jeremy Hutchinson, 2010-02-10
  • Better WPF Circular Progress Bar, Sacha Barber, 2010-01-04
